description:
Step into a place where nothing feels quite right — a silent, twisting space that seems to breathe on its own. Every corner hides a whisper, every shadow watches, and something follows your every move.

This is a horror experience built on tension, mystery, and the uneasy feeling that you're never truly alone. The walls feel too close, the silence too loud, and the presence behind you far too real.

Your only goal is simple, yet terrifying: keep moving, stay sharp, and don’t let fear slow you down. Because in this place… hesitation is dangerous.

Run fast. Think fast.
And whatever you do — don’t look back.
